Name: Vosabeci
description:
Seafood, specifically crab, is very popular among Fijians. Vosabeci understands the demand for seafood, as she has been operating her seafood business since 2022.

Today, she is in need of a loan to help her expand her business and upgrade her equipment so that she may obtain her catches at a faster rate. She plans to purchase fishing nets and crab traps and put a deposit on a boat and improved equipment that she requires.

She is excited to offer better services to her customers and hopes to earn an increased income from her sales.
